#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <map>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	map<string,int> mymap;
	int level = 0;
	string str;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>str;
		if(!(mymap.count(str)))
		{
			mymap[str]=1;
			if(level==0){
				level++;
				cout<<level<<" "<<str<<endl;
			}
		}
		else{
			mymap[str]++;
			if(mymap[str]>level){
				level++;
				cout<<level<<" "<<str<<endl;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
